altername_name: Simple 2000 Series DC Vol.01: Bittersweet Fools: The Ren'ai Adventure
Simple 2000 Series DC Vol.01: Bittersweet Fools: The Ren'ai Adventure
name: Simple 2000 Series DC Vol.01: Bittersweet Fools: The Renai Adventure
overview: Simple 2000 Series DC Vol.01: Bitter Sweet Fools: The Renai Adventure is an entry in D3Publisher's Simple series of low-budget games, and the first of four to be released on the Sega Dreamcast. This entry is a port of Bittersweet Fools, a PC game by minori, with pornographic content removed. It was only released in Japan.
